remarks: Rewrite the cartesian product of two sets as the intersection of their preimage by ` 1st ` and ` 2nd ` , the projections on the first and second elements.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Sep-2017.)
statement: xpinpreima $p |- ( A X. B ) = ( ( `' ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) " A ) i^i ( `' ( 2nd |` ( _V X. _V ) ) " B ) ) $.
